EmailTemplate.description: This is the default email invitation template for survey: Borrego Solar O&M Portfolio Customer Survey - Q4/2018
EmailTemplate.name: [Send using Timba Surveys] Borrego Solar O&M Portfolio Customer Survey - ...
EmailTemplate.subject: Borrego Solar O&M Portfolio Customer Survey - Q4/2018
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
The Borrego O&M Management Team is appreciative of your business and with the goal of increasing our portfolio clients' satisfaction, we periodically ask for detailed comments on our services and the expectations within the solar DG industry.
We thank you in advance for the time you are able to focus on this important feedback.
